on reading compounds: 底【テイ】base (logarithmic, exponential, number system), radix, base (triangle, cone, cylinder, etc.), type, kind, extent, degree

奥底【オクソコ】depths, bottom (of one's heart)
水底【スイテイ】sea or river bottom
